events.name: “There is a Warning Here”: Permian-Triassic Extinction Reveals the Devastation of a Climate Tipping Point
events.description: An ancient climate tipping point is revealed in new fossils dating back to Earth’s most severe extinction event, called the “Great Dying.”

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Trace, Mingo County - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Uncover the mysteries of a region ravaged by climate change and natural disasters. Explore the remnants of an ancient ecosystem that was pushed to the brink of extinction. Discover the warning signs of a tipping point in Earth's history.
